alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley; Yosemite Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 12:23PM PST until January 04 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow accumulations of 9-15 inches in the Sierra Nevada. Snow accumulations over 15 inches are possible at elevations above 6,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph * WHERE...Portions of central California. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and Wind may adversely impact travel. JPK
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
